title: TIL: Narayan Murthy funded OpIndia
selftext:
Maybe its an old news for you all but just today I learnt that PoopIndia (OpIndia) website, yes the same one that promotes hate across India, is funded by Narayan Murthy's foundation.

My reference is a shitty old 2018 news link [https://www.rediff.com/news/special/busting-fake-news-who-funds-whom/20180408.htm](https://www.rediff.com/news/special/busting-fake-news-who-funds-whom/20180408.htm) but here is another archived link : [https://web.archive.org/web/20211217205447/https://www.newslaundry.com/2020/06/23/opindia-hate-speech-vanishing-advertisers-and-an-undisclosed-bjp-connection](https://web.archive.org/web/20211217205447/https://www.newslaundry.com/2020/06/23/opindia-hate-speech-vanishing-advertisers-and-an-undisclosed-bjp-connection)

The ownership of Narayan Murthy in PoopIndia is about 2-3% but the asshole still funded a toxic anti-India website while being called a pioneer and shit like that.

Remember this when you see the name of Narayan Murthy next time.
comments: People should boycott him and his annoying wife.
